disableAzp(string).details: This function removes the azp from the whitelisted clients

params.domainName: The domain name containing kis, iss, and azp fields
The domain name contains kis, iss and azp fields.
params.publicKeyHash: The public key hash to validate.

returns._0: bool Returns true if the public key hash is valid and not revoked, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeDKIMPublicKeyHash(string,bytes32).details: This function requires that the public key hash is currently set and not already revoked.

params.domainName: The domain name contains kis, iss and azp fields.
params.publicKeyHash: The public key hash to revoke.

setDKIMPublicKeyHash(string,bytes32).details: This function requires that the public key hash is not already set or revoked.

params.domainName: The domain name contains kis, iss and azp fields.
params.publicKeyHash: The public key hash to set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

disableAzp(string).notice: Disables the azp (authorized party) associated with the given domain name

isDKIMPublicKeyHashValid(string,bytes32).notice: Checks if a public key hash is valid and not revoked for a given kis and iss.

revokeDKIMPublicKeyHash(string,bytes32).notice: Revokes a public key hash for `kis|iss` string after validating the provided signature.

setDKIMPublicKeyHash(string,bytes32).notice: Sets a public key hash for a `kis|iss` string  after validating the provided signature.
